sentence.text: Our study suggests that miR-9 functions as a tumor suppressor in HCC progression by inhibiting a series of target genes, including the newly validated miR-9/negative regulation of translation/AKT&ERK axis, thus providing potential therapeutic targets and novel prognostic biomarkers for HCC patients.
Mechanically, miR-9 plays a tumor suppressive role partially through a functional miR-9/negative regulation of translation/AKT&ERK axis.
